scripts.//: A bunch of useful tips and ticks on npm worth reading are available at https://github.com/jeffbader/Npm-Tips-and-Tricks and https://2ality.com/2022/08/npm-package-scripts.html
scripts.this:reset: npm run this:clean && shx rm -rf node_modules
scripts.reset: npm --prefix shared/back-end run reset && npm --prefix server run reset && npm --prefix web run reset && npm --prefix extensions run reset && npm --prefix electron run reset && npm run this:reset
scripts.this:clean: shx rm -rf generated build dist tmp
scripts.clean: npm --prefix shared/back-end run clean && npm --prefix server run clean && npm --prefix web run clean && npm --prefix extensions run clean && npm --prefix electron run clean && npm run this:clean
scripts.updateVersion: npm --prefix server run updateVersion && npm --prefix extensions run updateVersion && npm --prefix web run updateVersion && npm --prefix electron run updateVersion
scripts.shared-back-end:prerequisites: npm --prefix shared/back-end install --no-save && npm --prefix shared/back-end run build && gulp fixCaporalModule --directoryPath shared/back-end/node_modules/@caporal/core && shx rm -rf server/node_modules/@picteus/shared-back-end  electron/node_modules/@picteus/shared-back-end
scripts.server:prerequisites:shared: npm run server:prerequisites:install && gulp fixCaporalModule --directoryPath server/node_modules/@caporal/core
scripts.server:prerequisites:openapi: npm --prefix server run openApi:generateAndPackage && npm run server:prerequisites:install
scripts.electron:prerequisites: npm --prefix electron install --no-save --install-link && gulp fixCaporalModule --directoryPath electron/node_modules/@caporal/core
scripts.this:prerequisites: mkdirp generated electron/build && symlink-dir electron/build build
scripts.prerequisites: npm-run-all this:prerequisites shared-back-end:prerequisites server:prerequisites extensions:prerequisites web:prerequisites electron:prerequisites
scripts.web:build: cross-env BUILD_PATH="../build/web" npm --prefix web run build
scripts.docker:build: npm-run-all shared-back-end:build server:prerequisites extensions:build web:build docker:build:build
